title: Ariadne's Thread: Case Studies in the Therapeutic Relationship
description: This casebook provides a personal account of the struggles a counselor encounters in everyday clinical practice. Each of the eight studies, thoughtfully detailed by Dr. Cowan from his own experience, illuminates the therapist/client relationship. Follow-up discussions tie each case and the therapist's technique to counseling theory and practice. A final conclusion links all cases and the related discourse together.
author: Eric W. Cowan
